data.title: Staden-io-lib-utils
data.description: Staden Package "io_lib" (sometimes referred to as libstaden-read by distributions).    This contains code for reading and writing a variety of Bioinformatics / DNA Sequence formats.
data.name: io_lib

evidence: "Io_lib is a library of file reading and writing code to provide a general purpose SAM/BAM/CRAM, trace file (and Experiment File) reading interface."
"These link together to form a single 'libstaden-read' library supporting all the file formats via a single read_reading ... function call and analogous write_reading functions too."
